spx.utils

Class Image

  • java.lang.Object
    • spx.utils.Image

  • public class Image
extends java.lang.Object
    The Image class provides utility functions for loading icons and images from the spx.images package.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<java.awt.Image> getIconList()
      Gets the List of Images objects representing all the available sizes of SPx icon.
      static java.awt.Image getImage(java.lang.String name)
      Loads an image from the spx.images package and returns it as an Image.
      static java.awt.Image getImage(java.lang.String name, java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
      Loads an image from the spx.images package and returns it as an Image.
      static javax.swing.ImageIcon getImageIcon(java.lang.String name)
      Loads an image from the spx.images package and returns it as an ImageIcon.
      static javax.swing.ImageIcon getImageIcon(java.lang.String name, java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
      Loads an image from the spx.images package and returns it as an ImageIcon.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getIconList

        public static java.util.List<java.awt.Image> getIconList()
        Gets the List of Images objects representing all the available sizes of SPx icon.

        This method is useful for adding the SPx icon to a JFrame with the following code: 

         setIconImages(spx.utils.Image.getIconList());
        Returns:
        List of SPx icon images at different sizes.
        See Also:
        Image, Window.setIconImages(java.util.List)

      • getImageIcon

        public static javax.swing.ImageIcon getImageIcon(java.lang.String name)
        Loads an image from the spx.images package and returns it as an ImageIcon.

        This method uses the system class loader for loading the image.

        Parameters:
        name - Filename of image from spx.images.
        Returns:
        Image as an ImageIcon.
        See Also:
        getImageIcon(java.lang.String, java.lang.ClassLoader)

      • getImageIcon

        public static javax.swing.ImageIcon getImageIcon(java.lang.String name,
                                                 java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
        Loads an image from the spx.images package and returns it as an ImageIcon.

        This method uses the specified class loader for loading the image.

        The class loader for a class can be obtained as follows: 

        getClass().getClassLoader()
        Parameters:
        name - Filename of image from spx.images.
        classLoader - Class loader to load the image.
        Returns:
        Image as an ImageIcon.
        See Also:
        getImageIcon(java.lang.String)

      • getImage

        public static java.awt.Image getImage(java.lang.String name)
        Loads an image from the spx.images package and returns it as an Image.

        This method uses the system class loader for loading the image.

        Parameters:
        name - Filename of image from spx.images.
        Returns:
        Image or null on error.
        See Also:
        getImage(java.lang.String, java.lang.ClassLoader), Image

      • getImage

        public static java.awt.Image getImage(java.lang.String name,
                                      java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
        Loads an image from the spx.images package and returns it as an Image.

        This method uses the specified class loader for loading the image.

        The class loader for a class can be obtained as follows: 

        getClass().getClassLoader()
        Parameters:
        name - Filename of image from spx.images.
        classLoader - Class loader to load the image.
        Returns:
        Image or null on error.
        See Also:
        getImage(java.lang.String), Image
